posts.post_content:
Today I am selling my n28 Bennett as I found one I like better.  Its a very clean card with typical light chipping, good registration and presents well.  I picked it up about a year ago from B+L Auctions:

[url]http://www.b-lauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=4048[/url]

Just looking to recoup what I paid so Im asking Sold and that includes shipping.  Feel free to ask questions or for references.  Thanks for looking.
